text: Guru Harkrishan Public School, Patiala is a higher-secondary co-education private school in the Patiala city of Punjab, India. The school was founded in 2006 and is affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education of India. == References == Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:Educational institutions established in 2006 Category:2006 establishments in India
title: Guru Harkrishan Public School, Patiala
